channel.title: Podcast on Science in Progress
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on Science in Progress

item.title: Welcome to Science in Progress
item.description: Thanks for checking out our new site for the podcast Science in Progress. This podcast is brought to you by the Ecological Society of America’s Student Section. If you want more info on the ESA Student Section click here. We’re in the process of finishing up the first couple of episodes and posting them to various podcasting platforms. Check back soon for the very first episode!
